text: The national flag of Cameroon is a vertical tricolor of green, red and yellow, with a five-pointed yellow star in its center. ==Other flags== File:Flag of Cameroon (1961-1975).svg|Flag of Cameroon (1961–1975) File:Flag of Cameroon (1957).svg|Flag of Cameroon (1957–1961) File:Flag of British Cameroon.svg|Flag of British Cameroons (1922–1961) File:Flag of Deutsch-Kamerun.svg|Flag of German Cameroon (Proposed, but never used) ==Other websites== * Cameroon Category:Cameroon
title: Flag of Cameroon
